'''''Gravity Front''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series VIII]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must defeat the [[Prototype Cal. Breguet]] without being hit by its Gravity Ripple attack.

==Gameplay Notes==
* If any [[Geo Construct]]s or [[Dendro Core]]s are hit by the Gravity Ripple attack, it will be considered as a hit.
